channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report X-2024101513
item.description:
Report X-2024101513

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-25T09:22:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-17
  • City: LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LOADER POINTED TO LEAKING HAZMAT PAIL NEXT TO HAZMAT CAGE ON THE TWILIGHT SORT. RESPONDER UTILIZED DECISION TREE AND FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET FOR CLEAN UP. WORE PROPER PPE FOR CLEANUP. ALL DAMAGED MATERIAL PLACED IN DMN TRAY FOR TRANSPORT TO DMN PROCESSING AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
